name: 03 -  Colorfull dancing
description:
This is a small fragment of an upcoming loop of a dance called salay.
The Salay is a typical dance of the Andean Altiplano.
My artwork is produced from the exploration of multiple representation techniques. I am interested in the crossing of analog and digital. 
These are things that happen in the daily life of the Andean altiplano. They are the result of the practices of a community.
In the community the encounter takes place.
And in the encounter the movement. 
Movements are necessary to consolidate Identity.
